product_name: Justin's All-Natural Nut Butter Blend - 1.15 oz.
long_description: Justin's All Natural Nut Butter Blend is the perfect snack for people on the go! Protien-rich nut butter is certified Kosher. Tastes great without the use of added oils or refined sugar-naturally sweetened with honey. Convenient squeeze packages are perfect for the backpack, cooler or tackle box. Enjoy on sandwiches, crackers and fruit, or right from the package. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Justin's All Natural Nut Butter Blend is the perfect snack for people on the go!
